Why I\'d love to work at MAX.ng

The brand, the movement: MAX.ng changes the way people think about safety of transportation and delivering packages, all on a whole new level. I want to be a part of this movement. 
 
 The brand, the product: Apart from my skills as an Android developer, I have experience applying machine learning on application level. And with this possibility, UX with MAX.ng can be more personalized, allowing users be more productive by predicting and suggesting actions based on previous interactions. Examples of such personalized suggestions are: 
 “You have stopped at Domino’s (Yaba) twice during your rides in this week, would you like to include the same stop with this ride?” 
 “Your last four packages had delays of around 15 to 30 minutes each. This is most likely because your delivery times are around 4pm and 6pm, when traffic is usually very high. How about you change the time?” 
 
 The brand, the culture: I’ve had a sneak peek into what working at MAX.ng looks like. And it's totally amazing! 

 I understand that MAX.ng needs someone who can really hit the ground running. I believe that I am a great fit for that.
